Name: Hot Toddy (Hot Scotch & Tea)
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
Place bar spoon loaded with honey in warmed glass.
Add other ingredients and STIR until honey dissolves.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Tea and Scotch combine wonderfully in this hot and spicy winter warmer.
History: The first published reference to a Toddy was in England in 1741.
